reasons_to_visit.details: June offers the best weather conditions with warm temperatures and minimal rainfall, perfect for mountain activities.
Longest days of the year provide maximum daylight for mountain hiking, outdoor activities, and photography.
Multiple outdoor festivals, concerts, and cultural events throughout the city, including early summer celebrations.
Warm evenings and beautiful sunset lighting make June ideal for couples, especially at lakeside restaurants.
All seasonal attractions, mountain activities, and outdoor dining are fully operational.

reasons_to_avoid.details: June is one of the busiest months with long lines at popular attractions like Aquapark Babylon and Ještěd Tower.
Peak season pricing for accommodations, dining, and activities, especially near mountain attractions.
Popular restaurants and mountain activities require reservations well in advance.

activities: Cable car rides to Ještěd Tower
Romantic evening walks around the reservoir

special_events.description: Longest day celebrations and early summer festivals
Mountain biking competitions and outdoor sports activities

local_tips: Visit Ještěd Mountain early morning to avoid crowds
Book restaurants and mountain activities well in advance
Check weather before planning mountain hikes
Reserve lakeside dining at Rybářská bašta for sunset views
Combine Ještěd Tower visit with evening dining
Bring water and sun protection for mountain activities
Check festival schedules for early summer events
